basics.label: Engineering Officer
basics.summary: Looking for opportunities to work in an research environment for creating solutions using digital systems at circuit as well as system level.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Spearheaded a team of electricians and technicians to carry out preventive maintenance of equipment of LPG bottling plant.
Upkeep of electrical panels and control systems.
Maintenance of drive units, compressors, LPG pumps
Modified and developed various plant equipments to improve production line throughput.

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Oversaw the operations of LPG bottling plant production activities
Managed workforce on the production line

work.name: Company Name
highlights: Engaged in various automation and control system design

projects.name: Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) Based Chain Conveyor Tripping System
projects.description: Designed a control loop which was interfaced with a Allen Bradely PLC controller to read the current readings of individual drive units and provide appropriate tripping signals as per the motor health.

projects.name: Infrared Sensor based telescopic boom tripping system
projects.description: IR sensor based intrinsically safe system that detects presence of objects in front of moving machinery and trips them instantly.

publications.name: Virtual Instrumentation Approach to Neural Network Based Thermistor Linearization on Field Programmable Gate Array
publications.summary: K.P.S. Rana, N. Mittra, N. Pramanik , P. Dwivedi and P. Mahajan

publications.name: Some Applications of FPGA in Custom Waveform Generation and Triggering for Metrology
publications.publisher: 8th International Conference on Advances in Metrology
publications.summary: K. P. S. Rana, Vineet Kumar, Neel Pramanik , Nishant Mitra, Sumit Kumar Shakya
